title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A current endeavor could take a surprising twist today. Your immediate reaction might be to pause as you recollect a past mistake you made in a similar circumstance. However, you are not the same person as before, nor is the present situation identical to the previous one. Most importantly, you have the benefit of your experience to guide you now. Continue on your chosen path with faith in your pocket and hope in your heart. Civil rights leader Malcolm X said, Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
